Release Notes: 

    

  NO INSTALL / UNRAR & PLAY /  



 In this chapter of Thief, you once again take on the role of Garrett, a master 
thief who is rarely seen, never caught and capable of breaking into the most 
ingeniously secured places. Garrett steals from the wealthy and gives to himself, 
making his living in the dark and foreboding City...
